title: The Economist June 28th - July 4th 2008.zip
description:
Thanks to Larod112 the economist is now part of my weekly routine. So much so that when I saw it was not uploaded this weekend (I panic when I don&#039;t see it on a Saturday lunchtime!!) I went and "got hold of a copy" as I can&#039;t get through the week without it - and I am sure there are many other like me.

Please Seed as I need to turn the PC off quite soon (very old PC and I need to sleep), although I should be online between 6 - 7 GMT (if I can get up!) and 10 - 12 GMT (if I can get home!).

I have not had time to put these into folders as Larod112 does, so again a big thanks to you, we all here at Pirate Bay appreciate the economist each week.

And in true Larod112 traditions, here is the standard text:
The audio edition contains word-for-word recordings of all articles published in The Economist, read by professional broadcasters and actors. It is ideal for anyone who wants to listen to articles while travelling, exercising or just relaxing.

Grrrr...this is about the 3rd or 4th time I am trying to upload and it keeps timing out..!
